text: <@U25PYL3Q8|nickdeckerdevs> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/nickdeckerdevs/F2F6QD4FQ/trying_to_find_if_a_value_is_in_an_array_--_without_being_in_a_loop.html|Trying to find if a value is in an array -- without being in a loop> and commented: Is there a way with HUBL to find out if a certain value is inside an array/collection/dict?  I'd like to have access to this outside of the loop, so I'm wondering if there is some sort of array_intersect function??
I was thinking of using loop vars like .last -- but if there is no items in the collection, it wouldn't even enter the loop.
